12 Romantic Getaways In Delhi NCR For A Perfect Vacay With Bae

By Chhavi
149025 Interested |
128K  Views
Photo source: Samode Hotels

Going on a vacation with your partner is an experience like no other, filled with unforgettable memories that you'll cherish for years. It’s a well-deserved break from the chaos of city life, an escape from the relentless work schedule, and a chance to disconnect from the world, just the two of you. And while a week-long getaway to Corsica, like Tara and Ved from Tamasha, may not always be feasible, you can still enjoy a dreamy weekend retreat at one of the many romantic resorts in Delhi for couples. With luxe amenities and serene surroundings, you’ll find yourself wishing the vacation never ends.

To save you the trouble of searching, we’ve rounded up the best resorts near Delhi for couples, so you can focus on making memories!

Overview

 
  1. 1. Hill Fort, Kesroli
  2. 2. Laxmi Vilas Palace, Bharatpur
  3. 3. Tarudhan Valley, Manesar
  4. 4. The Westin Sohna Resort & Spa
  5. 5. Samode Palace, Jaipur
  6. 6. Aahana Resort, Jim Corbett
  7. 7. Alwarbagh, Sariska
  8. 8. Gaj Retreat, Punjab
  9. 9. The Coral Court Homestay, Agra
  10. 10. Jim's Jungle Retreat, Uttarakhand
  11. 11. Villa Mountain Crest, Kasauli
  12. 12. 28 Kothi, Jaipur

Here's A List Of Resorts Near Delhi For Couples

Hill Fort, Kesroli

Photo source: Neemrana Hotels

Hill Fort, Alwar, Kesroli

See On Map
BOOK HERE

The lesser-known cousin of the flagship Neemrana property, this 14th-century fort is not as grand in size, but packs in plenty of charm. You can take a bottle of wine up to one of the many terraces of the fort walls, or even dine at the dining room, where we can only hope for your sake that they will be serving Laal Maas. The rooms are cosy and tasteful. Plus, we even had a Rajasthani performance troupe drop in the evening we stayed.

Distance From Delhi: Around 165 km, 3 hours 

Price: Starting at INR 4,000 (approx.)

Nearby Attractions: Sariska Tiger Sanctuary, Kankwadi Fort, Pandupol, Jaisamand Lake

Highlights: Terrace pool, spa, fort tour, historic rooms, local & international delicacies, herb garden

Laxmi Vilas Palace, Bharatpur

Photo source: Laxmi Vilas Palace

Laxmi Niwas, Bharatpur

See On Map
BOOK HERE

If nothing else, a few years of living in the nation’s capital (or capital region) will definitely turn you into a forts-and-palaces snob. This one, we’re happy to report, does not disappoint. The high ceilings, checkered floors, chandeliers, and marble-inlaid walls will make you & your partner feel like royalty.

Distance From Delhi: Around 212.8 km, 4.5 hours 

Price: Starting at INR 7,250 (approx.)

Nearby Attractions: Keoladeo National Park, Lohagarh Fort

Highlights: Swimming pool, library, reflexology, verandah

Tarudhan Valley, Manesar

Photo courtesy: Tarudhan Valley

Lemon Tree Hotel, Manesar

See On Map
BOOK HERE

Tarudhan Valley is a gated golf community with villas that work as holiday homes for Delhi & Gurgaon families (and their lucky relatives!). There are a number of resorts around and if you're into golf, you must check out Classic Golf & Country Club. Not too far away, there's also a strawberry farm. The Lemon Tree Hotel in Tarudhan Valley is a popular property. Known for its lush green golf course, swimming pools and calming view, this hotel is highly rated. You can also check out the Surjivan Resort.

Distance From Delhi: Around 50 km, 2 hours 

Price: Starting at INR 9,000 (approx.)

Nearby Attractions: Heritage Transport Museum, Nature Safari India, NeverEnuf Garden Railway

Highlights: Rooftop jacuzzi, fitness centre, spa, restaurant, golf course, swimming pool

The Westin Sohna Resort & Spa

Photo source: The Westin Sohna Resort & Spa

The Westin Sohna Resort & Spa, Sohna

See On Map
BOOK HERE

If you told us that the busy corporate mill of Gurgaon’s Cyber City was less than an hour away from Westin, we’d have a hard time believing it. We loved the single villa rooms, with beds perfectly suited for sinking right into. There isn’t much to do outside the immediate area of the property, but with sprawling lawns and some good dining options, you have the perfect excuse to trade sightseeing for a poolside Pina Colada.

Distance From Delhi: Around 65.8 km, 2 hours 

Price: Starting at INR 16,000 (approx.)

Nearby Attractions: Damdama Lake, Kamboj Ruins, Sohna Lake

Highlights: Star/moon gazing, horse riding, cycling, aqua zorbing, fitness studio, swimming pool

Samode Palace, Jaipur

Photo source: Samode

Samode Palace, Jaipur

See On Map
BOOK HERE

The breathtaking architecture and serene location (tucked away under the shadow of low hills) make Jaipur’s Samode Palace one of the must-visit couple resorts near Delhi. The exclusivity and peacefulness will make you feel like royals and the palace offers a full health and spa set-up as well as a lovely Mughal garden to explore. They also offer romantic and special honeymoon packages that'll make your trip much more special.

Distance From Delhi: Around 236 km, 5 hours 

Price: Starting at INR 31,000 (approx.)

Nearby Attractions: Nahargarh Fort, Albert Hall Museum, City Palace, Jantar Mantar, Hawa Mahal

Highlights: Village, jeep, and camel safaris, durbar hall, sheesh mahal,  spa

Pro-Tip: Here's Your Guide To An Awesome Day In The Pink City

Aahana Resort, Jim Corbett

Photo source: Aahana Resort

Aahana Resort, Sawal Deh West

See On Map
BOOK HERE

Planning an offbeat weekend getaway? Look no further than Aahana Resort in Jim Corbett. Stretched across an area of 13.5 acres, this resort gives you an astounding glimpse of nature as it boasts over 4,500 trees. Their commitment to sustainability is definitely inspirational and the service will make you feel that they truly believe in "Atithi Devo Bhava."

Know more about this resort here. 

Distance From Delhi: Around 280 km, 6 hours 

Price: Starting at INR 26,000 (approx.)

Nearby Attractions: Corbett Tiger Reserve, Corbett Falls, Garjiya Devi Temple

Highlights: Buggy ride, spa, kumaoni culinary experience, nature walk, bird watching

Alwarbagh, Sariska

Photo courtesy: Alwarbagh by Aamod

Alwarbagh, Alwar

See On Map
BOOK HERE

This heritage resort by Aamod, made it to the list, yes! Equidistant from Sariska Tiger Reserve and Alwar, the place has a crazy tale to tell. Enjoy the luxurious treatment at this resort and take a break at the vast coverage of the resort (it's spread across 7 acres of land). 

Distance From Delhi: Around 188 km, 3.5 hours 

Price: Starting at INR 6,000 (approx.)

Nearby Attractions: The Hill Fort Kesroli, The Sariska Palace, Sariska Tiger Reserve

Highlights: Local cultural shows, open-air projection theatre, kite flying, camel cart rides, village walks

Gaj Retreat, Punjab

Photo source: Gaj Retreat

Gaj Retreat, Hoshiarpur

See On Map
BOOK HERE

If you're looking for romantic getaways in Delhi NCR with your significant other, stop looking. Gaj is the place to be. Their exotic experience is one of a kind. They offer mouth-watering food, crazy soft mattresses, and a huge pool!

Distance From Delhi: Around 366 km, 7.5 hours

Price: On Request

Nearby Attractions: Kamahi Devi Temple, Sheesh Mahal, Gurdwara Garna Sahib

Highlights: Sunrise jungle walk, dairy farm tour, bullock cart ride, floating breakfast, jungle hiking trails

The Coral Court Homestay, Agra

Photo source: The Coral Court Homestay

The Coral Court Homestay, Agra

See On Map
BOOK HERE

For the sake of reviving our childhood memories, let's head to Agra! It's very easy to reach via car (road trip! and once you're there, don't forget to dig into their delicious and iconic Pedas (take some back with you, too!). While there are a lot of economical stay options available in and around Agra, we recommend shacking up at The Coral Court Homestay for a beautiful time. Best part? It's damn affordable.

Distance From Delhi: Around 222 km, 3.5 hours

Price: Starting at INR 4,400 (approx.)

Nearby Attractions: Taj Mahal, Agra Fort, Itmad-ud-Daula Akbar tomb

Highlights: Taj nature walk, special diet menus, garden area, outdoor fireplace

Jim's Jungle Retreat, Uttarakhand

Photo source: Jim's Jungle Retreat

Jim's Jungle Retreat, Ramnagar

See On Map
BOOK HERE

If both of you love the wild and lush green forests, you must definitely consider visiting Uttrakhand. There are beautiful trekking trails around the region, where you will also find delicious pahadi food. We would recommend that you experience the adventures of forest reserves and sanctuaries. Maybe go out for safaris and watch animals and birds in their natural habitat. 

Distance From Delhi: Around 265 km, 6.5 hours

Price: Starting at INR 19,000 (approx.)

Nearby Attractions: Corbett Falls, Jim Corbett Museum, Girija Devi Temple

Highlights: Bird watching, organic farms, independent cottages, swimming pool, library, spa, nursery

Villa Mountain Crest, Kasauli

Photo courtesy: Villa Mountain Crest

Villa Mountain Crest, Gandhi Gram

See On Map
BOOK HERE

For mountain lovers, Valla Mountain Crest is one of the must-visit resorts near Delhi for couples. If you like the sound of delicious food and super warm service, this is the place near Kasauli is where you need to be.

Distance From Delhi: Around 314 km, 6 hours

Price: Starting at INR 7,000 (approx.)

Nearby Attractions: Jatoli Shiv Temple, Bon Monastery, Sunset Point

Highlights: Swimming pool, bonfire, lawn, treehouse, gazebo 

28 Kothi, Jaipur

Photo source: 28 Kothi

28 Kothi, Jaipur

See On Map
BOOK HERE

Giving you a complete taste of Rajasthan's culture, architecture, art, and more, this stunning boutique guest house is 28 Kothi. The space is absolutely gorgeous with luxe rooms and splendid decor. They have a well-stocked library, green outdoor space and otherworldly food.

Distance From Delhi: Around 297 km, 5 hours

Price: Starting at INR 6,000 (approx.)

Nearby Attractions: Nahargarh Fort, Jal Mahal, Hawa Mahal

Highlights: Farm-fresh vegetarian delights, yoga session, sun-lit terrace, library

Pro-Tip

If you wish to amp up on the royalty, then head over to these heritage hotels that are less than 10 hours away from Delhi.
